entities.name: the pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is a magical device used to store and retrieve memories. It is described as being in the office, where Harry is gazing at it.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He recognizes the Pensieve as one he had used before and is remembering its significance.

entities.name: godric gryffindor
entities.description: Godric Gryffindor is a founder of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The sword in the Pensieve once belonged to him.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is a phoenix who is present with Harry in the office.

entities.name: the sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical hat that sorts students into their respective houses at Hogwarts. It is mentioned as having previously sorted Harry into Gryffindor House.

entities.name: harry's house
entities.description: Harry's House refers to the Gryffindor House at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: the sword
entities.description: The sword is a magical object that once belonged to Godric Gryffindor. It is stored in the Pensieve.

entities.name: the glass case
entities.description: The glass case contains the Pensieve and is where Harry is gazing at it.

entities.name: the black cabinet
entities.description: The black cabinet is a container that Harry opens to find a shallow stone basin with strange carvings.

entities.name: the silver-white light
entities.description: The silvery-white light is shining from within the black cabinet and is coming from the contents of the shallow stone basin.

relationships.description: Harry recognizes the Pensieve as one he had used before and is remembering its significance.

Fawkes is present with Harry in the office.

Harry remembers how the sword had come to his aid when he thought all hope was lost.
